duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all aspects of sales within defined territory for assigned division(s).
Participate in all meetings, trade shows, conferences, events, as required by management.
Submit all reporting, as required by management.
Perform all responsibilities in a professional, courteous, and efficient manner.
Perform additional responsibilities, as required by management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Communication, Marketing or related field (Master's preferred)
2 years of wholesale footwear territory sales experience
Strong working knowledge of Microsoft Office, proprietary software, retail math
